title: How do I view a list of power-intensive apps?
answer:
For phones using EMUI 2.0 and EMUI 2.3, go to Settings and then select Power saving > Bkgd power-intensive apps. 

 For phones using EMUI 3.0, go to Settings, select Power saving and then switch to Details to view or terminate background power-intensive apps and check the hardware and software power consumption rankings.
keywords: save power, drain power, use power, app, list, software, background
